<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Terrifying Countenance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3339) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 65</row>

**Archetype** [Gray Gardener](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=124)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083); member of the Gray Gardeners

</column>

---

You can erect a magical cowl that terrorizes your enemies. Once per day, you can cast [_mask of terror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=185) as an innate occult spell, targeting yourself. If you critically hit a creature that's temporarily immune to the spell, the creature's temporary immunity ends.
